/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -Wall   CMakeFiles/simplePathTracer.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simplePathTracer.dir/src/texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simplePathTracer.dir/src/mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simplePathTracer.dir/src/camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simplePathTracer.dir/src/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simplePathTracer.dir/src/display.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simplePathTracer.dir/src/testClass.cpp.o  -o simplePathTracer /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lm -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXrandr.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXinerama.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXxf86vm.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXcursor.so
